v0: Our fleet engineers stand ready to begin the monumental task of retrofitting one of our existing Science ships into the new Explorer class. It is expected that this project will take approximately 250 days to complete. When finished, the Scientist Leader of the ship will transfer to their new ship automatically.
v1: 我们的舰队工程师已准备好开始一项艰巨的任务，将我们现有的科学船改装成新的探索者级科研船。预计该项目将需要大约250天完成。完成后，该船的科学家领袖将自动转移到他们的新船。
探索者级超空间驱动装置

v0: Ships equipped with Hyper Drives travel swiftly between the edges of star systems along interstellar hyperlanes.
v1: 配备超空间驱动器的飞船沿着星际超航道在恒星系统的边缘之间快速行驶。

v0:
§HProduces:§! 7 Alloys
§HUpkeep:§! 3 Minerals & 3 Energy
This facility allows an empire to convert an old Explorer into a modern alloy refinery, able to produce a small amount of alloys each month.
v1:
§H生产：§! 7 合金
§H维护费：§! 3 矿物 & 3 能量币
该部件将探索者转变为现代化的合金铸造厂，每月能够生产少量合金。

v0: Every anomaly, by its very nature, forces us to ask questions, to challenge previously-held assumptions. There is nothing more valuable than this, when it comes to the advancement of science. We cannot risk missing any potential anomalies, and the secrets they hold. This specialized laboratory will ensure that we find every last anomaly the galaxy has to offer.
v1: 每一个异常现象都让我们提出新的问题，挑战之前的假设。对于科学的进步来说，没有什么比这更有价值的了。我们不能冒险错过任何潜在的异常现象及其所隐藏的秘密。这个专门的实验室将确保我们找到银河系所提供的每一个异常现象。

v0: This laboratory is dedicated to the study of anomalies, those strange and wonderful things in the galaxy that don't seem to follow the same rules as everything else. Each one deserves a full, comprehensive analysis, but there is so much to discover, and so little time. By optimizing the laboratory for the study of these delightful oddities, we can insure that every anomaly gets the attention it deserves, while also dramatically speeding up research time.
v1: 这个实验室致力于研究异常现象，即银河系中那些奇怪而奇妙的事物，它们似乎并不遵循与其他事物相同的规则。虽然每一项异常都值得进行全面的分析，但需要计算的数据太多而时间却太少，所以通过优化实验室来研究这些奇怪的现象，我们可以确保每个异常现象都得到应有的关注，同时也大大缩短了研究所需的时间。

v0: This laboratory is dedicated to the study of archaeological research sites. These sites hold untold mysteries which fire the imagination, and they deserve a dedicated lab where everything about them can be analyzed in full.
v1: 该实验室致力于优化对遗址的考古研究。这些遗址蕴藏着不为人知的秘密，激发了人们的想象力，它们值得拥有一个专门的实验室，在那里我们可以对遗址的一切进行全面分析。

v0: This laboratory is dedicated to the research and analysis of spacecraft debris left behind from space battles. Space debris, both modern and ancient, can be the key to unlocking untold mysteries of the universe.
v1: 该实验室致力于研究和分析太空战斗中留下的航天器碎片，无论是来自古代还是现代飞行器的碎片都可以成为解开宇宙不为人知的奥秘的钥匙。

v0:
§HProduces:§! 10 Engineering Research
This advanced laboratory is dedicated to producing ground-breaking Engineering research--exploration into the secrets of materials, industry, spacecraft, propulsion, and robotics.
v1:
§HProduces:§! 10工程学研究
这个先进的实验室致力于开展突破性的工程研究——探索材料、工业、航天器、推进和机器人技术的秘密。

v0:
§HProduces:§! 7 Minerals
§HUpkeep:§! 5 Energy
This facility allows an empire to convert an old Explorer into an advanced mining platform, able to produce a small amount of minerals each month.
v1:
§H生产：§! 7 矿物
§H维护费：§! 5 能量币
该部件将探索者转变为先进的采矿平台，每月能够生产少量矿物。

v0: These advanced 3D navigational systems are specially designed to extend our sensor range as far out into the galaxy as possible, rapidly updating and adding to our map of the galaxy by conducting preliminary scans of wide swathes of space from afar.
v1: 这些先进的 3D 导航系统经过专门设计，可以将我们的传感器范围尽可能扩展到整个银河系，通过从远处对大片空间进行初步扫描，快速更新并添加到我们的银河系地图中。

v0:
§HProduces:§! 10 Physics Research
This advanced laboratory is dedicated to producing ground-breaking Physics research--exploration into the secrets of matter and energy, computers and field manipulation.
v1:
§HProduces:§! 10 物理学研究
这个先进的实验室致力于进行突破性的物理研究——探索物质和能量、计算机和场操纵的秘密。

v0: With so much to explore, every moment spent traveling between survey sites is a moment wasted. These Quantum Thrusters are designed to push our ship through space at blistering speeds, always rushing towards the next planet, the next star, the next great mystery waiting to be solved.
v1: 广阔的星系里包含如此之多值得探索的事物，花费在旅途上的每一秒都是无法接受的浪费。这些量子推进器的设计目的就是推动我们的飞船以极快的速度穿梭于星际之间，一直冲向下一颗行星、下一颗恒星、下一个等待解开的伟大谜团。

v0:
§HProduces:§! 10 Society Research
This advanced laboratory is dedicated to producing ground-breaking Society research--exploration into the secrets of sociology, biology, philosophy, and military theory, the sciences of life and culture.
v1:
§HProduces:§! 10 社会学研究
这个高级的实验室致力于开展开创性的社会学研究——探索社会学、生物学、哲学、军事理论、生命和文化科学的秘密。

v0:
§HProduces:§! 7 Energy
§HUpkeep:§! 5 Minerals
This facility allows an empire to convert an old Explorer into a large solar panel array and battery system, able to produce a small amount of energy each month.
v1:
§HProduces:§! 7 能量币
§HUpkeep:§! 5 矿物
该设施允许帝国将旧的探索者级改装成大型太阳能电池板阵列和电池系统，每月能够产生少量的能源。

v0: This large system is used for mapping the surrounding space, allowing the ship's computers to calculate and recover from FTL jumps with greatly increased speed. Far more effective than the model used on regular warships, these Stellar Cartography modules are also far more finicky, and require the steady hand of a highly-trained Science Officer to maintain.
v1: 这个大型系统用于绘制周围空间的地图，使飞船的计算机能够以极高的速度完成超光速跳跃所需要的计算。这些恒星制图模块比常规军舰上使用的模型有效得多，但也更加挑剔，需要训练有素的科学官员的稳定双手来维护。

v0: There are so many planets and systems out there, waiting, begging to be discovered, and each one might hold the key to new discoveries. There's no time to waste, and this specialized laboratory will allow us to conduct our surveys much, much faster - which means we'll be able to survey more and more space in the same amount of time. More surveys means more discovery, more adventure, and more knowledge about the galaxy.
v1: 广阔的星系包含如此多的等待被发现的行星和恒星系，每一颗都可能掌握着新发现的钥匙。没有时间可以浪费了，这个专业实验室将使我们能够更快地进行调查——这意味着我们将能够在相同的时间内调查越来越多的空间。更多的调查意味着更多的发现、更多的冒险以及更多关于银河系的知识。
基础战斗机机翼（点防御）I

v0: Basic Fighter-class strike craft will deploy to engage nearby hostiles when the mothership enters battle. Will stay close to its carrier to intercept bombers and missiles.

改进战斗机机翼（点防御）II

先进战斗机机翼（点防御）III

v0:
This extremely advanced computer system can intelligently run all combat systems on a ship without taking over the helm, allowing for complete movement control during combat.

§GHow To Use:§! §BThis computer is available only on certain ship classes. It will allow the player to directly control the movement of these ships while in combat.

Ships equipped with this computer§! §HMUST§! §Bbe in a fleet by themselves or only with other ships that have the same computer - the movement control will not work in fleets mixed with other ships that have different combat computers.

Once equipped, the fleet will move to the position you designate and will continue firing as long as they have a target within weapons range.§! §HThe fleet will not move again until you tell them to do so.§!
v1:
这种极其先进的计算机系统可以在不接管导航系统的情况下智能地指挥舰船上的所有作战系统，从而实现玩家在战斗中自由移动舰船。
§G使用方法：§! §B该计算机仅适用于某些舰船类别。它将允许玩家在战斗中直接控制这些舰船的移动。配备此计算机的舰船§! §H必须§! §B独立组建舰队并且只包含该型舰船或只包含装备了同样的计算机系统的舰船 —— 移动控制不适用于与其他拥有不同战斗计算机的舰船混合编队。一旦装备该计算机系统，舰队将移动到您指定的位置，并自动攻击所有在射程范围内的敌方目标。§! §H同时舰队将保持在该位置直到您发出新的指令§!

v0: Taking advantage of the knowledge discovered from the Enigmatic Fortress along with our own discoveries, we can now take zero point energy directly from the subspace of our own universe without the risk of creating unstable exotic particles, allowing continuous energy limited only by our ability to control the flow of energy.
v1: 利用从神秘堡垒发现的知识以及我们自己的研究成果，现在我们可以从本宇宙的子空间中获取零点能量，并且无需担心产生不稳定的奇异粒子，有效的将能量输出控制在安全范围内。

v0: The biggest laser in existence, for the biggest ship in existence, to overcompensate for a not-so-big Leader.
v1: 现存最大的激光器，适用于现有最大的舰船。
从原子层面彻底摧毁敌方的武器

v0: A much larger and more advanced version of the Cruiser designed for front-line combat duties.
v1: 更大更先进的巡洋舰，专为前线作战任务而设计。

v0: Battleships are expensive but powerful. With their great firing range, they excel at injuring an opponent before they can strike back.
v1: 战列舰价格昂贵但威力强大。凭借其巨大的射程，他们擅长在对手反击之前对其造成伤害。

v0: Massive warships capable of carrying large numbers of Strike Craft. Due to the space needed for the hangars, these ships have little direct offensive capability must be protected by other combat vessels.
v1: 能够搭载大量攻击机的大型战舰。由于机库占据了绝大部分船体，这些舰船几乎没有直接进攻的能力，必须受到其他舰船的保护。

v0: Colony Ships carry settlers from settled planets to new ones for colonization. Being a civilian ship, they are unarmored, unarmed and vulnerable.
v1: 殖民船将定居者从已定居的星球运送到新的星球进行殖民。作为一艘民用船只，它们没有装甲、没有武器并且很脆弱。

v0: These immense ships are not equipped to fight hostile fleets, but their job is instead to neutralize entire worlds.
v1: 这些巨大的舰船没有装备武器来对抗敌方舰队，但它们的任务是压制整个宇宙。

v0: Construction Ships are necessary for building any space station. Being a civilian ship, they are unarmored, unarmed and vulnerable.
v1: 建造任何空间站都需要建造船。作为一艘民用船只，它们没有装甲、没有武器并且很脆弱。

v0: Corvettes are the first military ship class available for empires. They are fast, nimble and cheap.
v1: 护卫舰是帝国第一种可用的军舰。它们快速、灵活且便宜。

v0: Cruisers are versatile and durable, capable of both soaking up and delivering damage.
v1: 巡洋舰用途广泛且耐用，能够吸收和造成伤害。

v0: Destroyers trade the agility and speed of a Corvette for more firepower and a thicker hull.
v1: 驱逐舰用护卫舰的敏捷性和速度换取了更强的火力和更厚的船体。

v0: A larger and more advanced version of the Battleship, designed to be the primary front-line warship for any empire.
v1: 更大更先进的战列舰，旨在成为任何帝国的主要前线战舰。

v0: A Cruiser-sized ship capable of carrying a small number of Strike Craft.
v1: 巡洋舰级舰船，能够搭载少量攻击机。

v0: A combat-capable Science ship designed to withstand hostile forces while boldly going where no one has gone before.
v1: 一艘具有战斗能力的科学船，旨在抵御敌方势力，同时大胆前往前人未曾去过的地方。

v0: A massive command and control ship with unbelievable offensive capability. The pride and joy of any Naval fleet.
v1: 一艘具有令人难以置信的攻击能力的大型指挥和控制舰。任何海军舰队的骄傲和喜悦。

v0: Frigates are an advanced variant of the Corvette that specialize torpedo delivery. They may be slower and more vulnerable, but can be devastating against large targets.
v1: 雷击舰是护卫舰的高级变体，专门用于鱼雷发射。它们可能速度较慢且更容易受到攻击，但对大型目标可能具有毁灭性的打击。

v0: Building a Juggernaut is a great undertaking for any empire. These massive ships function both as mobile shipyards and support vessels.
v1: 对于任何帝国来说，制造一艘主宰者都是一项伟大的事业。这些大型舰船既可用作移动造船厂，也可用作支援舰。

v0: An Outpost is the lowest level of a starbase, having little function except marking ownership of a star system.
v1: 前哨基地是最低等级的恒星基地，除了宣称恒星系统的所有权之外几乎没有什么功能。

v0: Hold and drag §GRight Mouse Button§! on the ship model to rotate.
v1: 在船模型上按住并拖动§G鼠标右键§!进行旋转。

v0: Science Ships are primarily used to explore new star systems and research anomalies. Being a civilian ship, they are unarmored and vulnerable.
v1: 科学船主要用于探索新的恒星系统和研究异常现象。作为一艘民用船只，它们没有装甲且脆弱。

v0: A Citadel is the highest upgradeable level of a starbase. Equipped with immense defenses, a Citadel is a hard nut for any enemy to crack.
v1: 堡垒基地是星际基地的最高级别。堡垒配备了巨大的防御设施，对于任何敌人来说都是一个难以攻克的目标。

v0: Strike Cruisers are designed to catch enemy fleets and hold them in position until a friendly fleet can arrive to finish the job.
v1: 攻击巡洋舰的设计目的是追击敌方舰队并将其围困在原地，直到友方舰队到达完成任务。

v0: Though they are immensely powerful in and of themselves, Titans can also use Aura abilities to boost friendly ships.
v1: 泰坦在自身非常强大的同时也可以使用光环能力来增强友方舰船。

v0: Transport Ships carry armies to assault hostile planets during a war. Being unarmored and unarmed, they require a supporting fleet when in hostile territory.
v1: 运输船在战争期间携带军队攻击敌对行星。由于没有装甲和武装，它们在敌对领土上需要一支支援舰队。

v0: Use §GMouse Scroll Wheel Forward§! to zoom in.
v1: 使用§G鼠标滚轮向前滚动来§!放大。

v0: Use §GMouse Scroll Wheel Backward§! to zoom out.
v1: 使用§G鼠标滚轮向后滚动来§!缩小。

v0: Specialized reactor powered by an artificial black hole
v1: 由人造黑洞提供动力的反应堆

v0: This secondary series of backup shield generators reinforces the ship's shields during combat, making the shields more resilient against enemy fire.
v1: 备用护盾发生器在战斗中增强了舰船的护盾，使护盾更能抵御敌人的火力。

v0: Long deployments aboard spacefaring warships can take their toll on a ship's crew. Having designated Crew Lounge areas will provide the crew with a place to relieve excess stress, improve mental health, and, in the end, improve combat performance as a result.
v1: 长期部署在太空舰队中可能会对船员造成伤害。船员休息室将为船员提供缓解过度压力、改善心理健康的场所，并最终提高战斗表现。

v0: These specialized crew members are trained in rapid ship repair under battlefield conditions to keep the ship running longer, and to reduce the need to head home for repairs after combat engagements.
v1: 这些专业船员接受过战场条件下快速船舶维修培训，以保持船舶运行更长时间，并减少战斗后回家维修的需要。

v0: These deflector arrays relieve strain on the shield generators, allowing the ship's shields to regenerate faster after combat, to get ready for the next engagement. In campaigns where multiple battles may be fought in the same system in quick succession, this can mean the difference between victory and defeat.
v1: 这些偏转阵列减轻了护盾发生器的压力，使舰船的护盾能够在战斗后更快地再生，为下一次交战做好准备。在同一星系中快速连续的多场战斗中恢复护盾值是相当重要的能力，这可能代表着胜利与失败的区别。

v0: This advanced targeting system allows the ship to acquire targeting solutions faster and more precisely, inflicting greater damage on enemy vessels in combat.
v1: 这种先进的瞄准系统使舰船能够更快、更精确的瞄准，从而在战斗中对敌舰造成更大的伤害。

v0: A clean crew is a happy crew. A happy crew blows stuff up. And no, we still don't know why it uses power.
v1: 一个干净的船员就是一个快乐的船员。一群快乐的船员把东西炸毁了。不，我们仍然不知道它为什么要使用电力。（待校译）

v0: This advanced point-defense weapon system is specifically designed to track tiny, highly evasive targets - missiles, torpedoes, and strike craft - and provide extremely precise targeting solutions at blistering speeds, increasing the fire rate and damage potential of ship-borne point-defense weapons.
v1: 这种先进的点防御武器系统专门设计用于跟踪微小、高闪避的目标（比如导弹、鱼雷和攻击机），并能以极快的速度进行瞄准，从而提高舰载点防御的射速和伤害。

v0: These advanced sensors increase sensor range using multiphase generators, updating and adding to our map of the galaxy by conducting preliminary scans of wide swathes of space from afar.
v1: 这些先进的传感器使用多相发生器增加传感器范围，通过从远处对大片空间进行初步扫描来更新和添加我们的银河系地图。

v0: This advanced 3D navigational system serves two functions: First, increasing the ability of the ship's weapons to track enemy vessels in combat, and second, to increase the range of the ship's Jump Drives, if such drives are equipped.
v1: 这种先进的 3D 导航系统有两个功能：第一，提高舰船武器在战斗中跟踪敌方舰船的能力；第二，增加舰船跃迁驱动器的范围（如果配备了跃迁驱动器）。

v0: Even the most powerful fleets are useless if they are not where they need to be, when they need to be there. While very expensive to maintain, and causing increased wear and tear on the ship as a whole, these Quantum Thrusters will provide a significant boost to sublight speed, allowing our fleets to travel faster to respond to any situations that may arise.
v1: 即使是最强大的舰队，如果没有及时出现在需要它们的地方，也是毫无用处的。虽然维护成本非常昂贵，并且会增加整个舰船的磨损，但这些量子推进器将显着提高亚光速，使我们的舰队能够更快地行驶，以应对可能出现的任何情况。

v0: Commanding a warship is a heavy burden, and even the most able Captains are likely to feel the strain. Setting aside a private space for the Captain of the vessel to relax, while still being available in case of emergencies, will improve the Captain's mental health, and improve their ability to command the vessel when the time comes to engage in combat.
v1: 指挥一艘战舰是一个沉重的负担，即使是最有能力的舰长也可能会感到压力。为舰长留出一个在紧急情况下仍可使用的私人放松空间，将显著改善舰长的心理健康，并提高他们在战斗时指挥舰队的能力。

v0: This large system is used for mapping the surrounding space, allowing the ship's computers to calculate and recover from FTL jumps with increased speed.
v1: 这个大型系统用于绘制周围空间的地图，使舰上的计算机能够以更快的速度计算超光速跃迁参数并快速的从中恢复。

v0: An advanced network of radar and communication arrays that facilitate the command and control of large numbers of Strike Craft, increasing their effectiveness.
v1: 先进的雷达和通信阵列网络，有助于指挥和控制大量攻击机，提高其效率。

v0: This advanced system of forcefields strengthens the ship's hull structure from within, helping the vessel resist enemy fire for longer periods before failing.
v1: 这种先进的力场系统从内部强化了舰船的船体结构，帮助舰船在被击毁前可以更长时间地抵抗敌人的火力。

v0:
§HAI Combat System§!
This extremely advanced computer system can intelligently run all combat systems on a ship without taking over the helm, allowing for complete movement control during combat. Available for Carriers, Fleet Support Ships, and the Flagship.
v1:
§H人工智能战斗系统§!
这种极其先进的计算机系统可以在不接管导航系统的情况下智能地指挥舰船上的所有作战系统，从而实现玩家在战斗中自由移动舰船。在母舰、支援舰以及旗舰上可用。

v0: §HUnlocks Combat Computer:§! Artificial Intelligence Combat System
v1: §H解锁战斗计算机：§! 人工智能战斗系统

v0:
§HBattlecruiser§!
As larger and larger vessels become more common, combat is taking place at longer ranges, and offensive firepower is becoming an ever-more-decisive factor in battle. Our naval theorists suggest building a long, powerful vessel capable of mounting large, medium, and most notably, guided weapon emplacements, to specialize in hurling as much weaponry at the enemy as possible, in either mid- or long-range combat.
v1:
§H战列巡洋舰§!
随着舰船的规模不断的变大，射程原来越远的武器大大的提升了战场范围，进攻性火力正在成为战斗的决定性因素。我们的海军理论家建议建造一艘更强大的舰船，能够安装大型、中型以及最引人注目的制导武器炮台，以便在中远程战斗中向敌人输出强大的火力。
§H解锁舰船类型：§! 战列巡洋舰

v0:
§HCarrier§!
Strike Craft have proven to be highly successful weapons in naval combat. It is time to design a specialized warship for the express purpose of carrying these weapons into battle, and housing the large support staff and maintenance bays that they require. Doing so will allow these new Carrier vessels to carry far more strike craft than their more improvised predecessors.
v1:
§H母舰§!
事实证明，攻击机是太空战斗中非常成功的武器。现在是时候设计一艘专门的军舰了，其明确目的是携带这些武器投入战斗，并容纳所需的大量支持人员和维护舱。

v0:
§HAdvanced Cruise Missiles§!
With the advent of Battlecruisers, which are designed to be capable of fielding large numbers of missile launchers, and the development of combat at longer and longer ranges, as well as the appearance of massive capital ships and defensive installations, there is a clear need for larger, more powerful missiles capable of taking on these new threats, and being launched from our Battlecruisers. These Advanced Cruise Missiles are the answer to this emerging need.
v1:
§H先进巡航导弹§!
战列巡洋舰的设计目的之一是能够部署大量导弹发射器，为了应对越来越远的长距离作战，以及大型主力舰和防御设施的出现，战列巡洋舰需要能够应对这些新威胁的更大、更强的导弹，这些先进巡航导弹可以满足这一新兴需求。

v0:
§HUnlocks Weapon:§! Tomahawk Advanced Cruise Missile
§HUnlocks Weapon:§! Harpoon Advanced Cruise Missile
v1:
§H解锁部件：§! 战斧先进巡航导弹
§H解锁部件：§! 鱼叉先进巡航导弹

v0:
§HStarbase Defense Fortress§!
As fleets grow larger and more powerful, it becomes necessary for our defensive installations to grow in strength, as well. These expanded Fortress-level defensive installations, an upgrade to the Defense Stations currently in use, will allow us to better defend our territory from enemy attack.
v1:
§H星际防御要塞§!
随着舰队规模变得越来越强大，我们的防御设施也有必要增强实力。这些扩大的要塞级防御设施是对目前在役的防御站的升级，将使我们能够更好地保卫我们的领土免受敌人的攻击。
§H解锁恒星基地建筑：§! 星际防御要塞

v0:
§HStarbase Defense Station§!
As fleets grow larger and more powerful, it becomes necessary for our defensive installations to grow in strength, as well. These expanded Defense Stations, an upgrade to the basic Defense Platforms we currently use, will allow us to better defend our territory from enemy attack.
v1:
§H星际防御基地§!
随着舰队变得越来越强大，我们的防御设施也有必要增强实力。这些扩展的防御站是我们目前使用的基本防御平台的升级，将使我们能够更好地保卫我们的领土免受敌人的攻击。
§H解锁恒星基地建筑：§! 星际防御基地

v0:
§HDreadnought§!
The Battleship heralded a new era of ship design and naval combat. The ability to both deliver and take massive damage at long range, and the advent of devastating XL weaponry, have completely changed the nature of warfare. Our naval engineers believe that we should develop an even better version of these powerful ships. Their proposed "Dreadnoughts" would be capable of mounting heavier defenses, more guns, and even two of the incredible XL weapons that have been so successful on the battlefield.
v1:
§H无畏舰§!
战列舰的出现预示着舰船设计和太空战斗的新时代。这些在远距离上造成巨大伤害的能力，以及毁灭性的 XL 武器的出现，彻底改变了战争的性质。我们的太空工程师认为，我们应该开发这些强大舰船的升级版本。他们提出的“无畏舰”将能够安装更重的防御、更多的火炮，甚至还有两种在战场上非常成功的令人难以置信的XL武器。

v0:
§HDrydock§!
This specially-designed facility makes use of advanced technology to maintain atmospheric pressures within the Shipyards, allowing workers to more easily build, maintain, upgrade, and repair many warships at once.
v1:
§H封闭式船坞§!
这个专门设计的设施利用先进技术来维持造船厂内的大气压力，使工人能够更轻松地同时建造、维护、升级和修理许多军舰。
§H解锁恒星基地建筑：§! 封闭式船坞

§HEscort Carrier§!
The Destroyer class can be repurposed as a dedicated light Strike Craft platform, allowing our fleets to bring much needed firepower to the front lines.
v1:

§H解锁舰船升级：§! 护航母舰

v0:
§HFlagship§!
The naval arms race has seen the production of larger and larger warships with no end in sight. Our naval engineers have suggested jumping to the logical conclusion of this serial escalation by constructing a ship so massive and powerful, that no empire will be able to support more than one of them at a time. This proposed Flagship will be the ultimate warship. Designed for maximum versatility, each section will have many possible configurations, allowing us to design our Flagship to suit our purposes. Mounting far more thrusters per ton than any other ship, the Flagship will be able to take any position in the fleet, from a long-range battery in the rear, to a massive brawler at the tip of a fleet's spear.

This power and versatility will come at a heavy cost, however. Merely building the Flagship will be an enormous endeavor, requiring a colossal stockpile of resources and a significant investment of time and manpower. Upon completion, it will take the entire GDP of a small star nation to maintain; as a result, it will require a massive amount of political influence to obtain approval for the project.
v1:
§H旗舰§!
海军军备竞赛已经见证了越来越大的军舰的生产，并且没有结束的迹象。我们的太空工程师建议，通过建造一艘如此史无前例强大的舰船来终结这一竞赛，这艘旗舰如此之复杂和昂贵以至于任何帝国只能在同一时间拥有一艘。这艘拟议的旗舰将是终极战舰。为实现最大的多功能性而设计，每个部分都有许多可能的配置，使我们能够灵活的调整旗舰的设计以满足我们的需要。旗舰安装的推进器比任何其他舰船都多得多，因此这艘旗舰将能够占据舰队中的任何位置，从后方的远程炮台，到带领舰队冲锋的大型战斗舰。然而，这种强大的多功能性将付出沉重的代价。仅仅建造旗舰就将是一项艰巨的任务，需要大量的资源储备以及大量的时间和人力投入。建成后，需要一个小型帝国的全部GDP才能维持；因此，该项目需要巨大的政治影响力才能获得批准。

§H解锁巨构：§! 星际购物中心

v0:
§HSolar Stronghold§!
The final upgrade in the starbase chain, the Solar Stronghold is the ultimate command and defense station, the largest class of starbase that it is possible to build. Enemy fleets will break upon these massive bulwarks, and each one is a vital asset to our empire, defending the most critical locations on the galactic map.
v1:
§H终极恒星要塞§!
恒星要塞是星际基地的最终形态，是终极指挥和防御中心，是可以建造的最大级别的星际基地。敌方舰队将难以突破这些巨大的堡垒，每一座恒星要塞都是帝国的重要资产，保卫着银河地图上最关键的位置。
§H解锁恒星基地升级：§! 终极恒星要塞

v0:
§HHeavy Carrier§!
As our ship building capabilities continue to increase, we continue to look for new ways to advance our current ship class layouts. Combined with new advancements in miniaturizing many of the support facilities required for the maintenance of strike craft, we believe that we can alter our existing Carrier designs into Heavy Carriers, with the ability to support more hangar bays.
v1:
§H重型母舰§!
随着我们的造船能力不断增强，我们不断寻找新的方法来改进我们当前的舰船结构。结合维护攻击机所需的许多支持设施小型化方面的新进展，我们相信我们可以将现有的母舰设计改为重型母舰，并能够支持更多的机库。
§H解锁舰船类型：§! 重型母舰
§H解锁巨构：§! 银河中心医院

v0: An utterly gargantuan, state-of-the-art space-borne hospital, dedicated to the study of the various xenoraces in the galaxy, and the analysis and treatment of all the diseases and conditions that afflict them.
v1: 一座极其庞大、最先进的太空医院，致力于研究银河系中的各种异形种族，并分析和治疗困扰他们的所有疾病和状况。

v0:
§HHyperlane Generation§!
Allows the creation and removal of hyperlanes.
v1:
§H超空间航道生成§!
允许生成或删除超空间航道
§H解锁特性：§! 超空间航道生成

v0:
§HMining Base§!
System wide mineral processing hub that enhances mineral production for the entire system.
v1:
§H采矿站§!
星系范围内的矿物加工中心，可提高整个系统的矿物产量。
§H解锁恒星基地建筑：§! 星系矿物精炼厂

v0: This is an automatic starting tech to check for the Apocalypse DLC.
v1: 这是一项自动启动技术，用于检查 Apocalypse DLC。

v0: This is an automatic starting tech to check for the Apocalypse DLC.
v1: 这是一项自动启动技术，用于检查 Apocalypse DLC。

v0:
§HPD Frigate§!
Missiles, torpedoes, and strike craft all pose a grave threat to our fleets. Our naval engineers suggest re-designing our Frigates to mount an array of numerous point-defense weapons to shoot down these targets before they can reach our ships.
v1:
§H点防护卫舰§!
导弹、鱼雷和攻击机都对我们的舰队构成严重威胁。我们的太空工程师建议重新设计护卫舰，安装一系列点防御武器，以便在这些武器击中我们的舰船之前将其击落。
§H解锁舰船类型：§! 点防护卫舰

v0:
§HPower Station§!
System wide energy grid that enhances energy production for the entire system.
v1:
§H星系能量网络§!
全星系能源网格，增强整个星系的能源生产。
§H解锁恒星基地建筑：§! 星系能量网络

v0:
§HSensor Station§!
The starbase sensor station uses advanced sensor arrays to extend our intelligence gathering capabilities across several star systems, giving us advanced warning of any possible threats near our borders.
v1:
§H传感器站§!
恒星基地传感器站使用先进的传感器阵列将我们的情报收集能力扩展到多个恒星系统，为我们边境附近的任何可能的威胁提供预先警告。
§H解锁恒星基地建筑：§! 传感器站

v0:
§HAdvanced Warship Components§!
Our scientists have come up with a wide range of powerful new modules allowing for the enhancement and further specialization of our warships. Now we only have to miniaturize them, to make them small enough to carry aboard our vessels.
v1:
§H先进战舰部件§!
我们的科学家提出了各种强大的新模块，可以强化我们的战舰并使其能力进一步增强。现在我们只需要将它们小型化，使其小到足以携带在我们的船上。
§H解锁部件：§! 先进战舰部件

v0: While capital ships are far more powerful than any vessels that have come before them, they are also far more expensive, and pose juicy targets for swarms of smaller, cheaper vessels that can overwhelm the capital ships with sheer numbers. To counter this, our engineers are working on a few blueprints that could adapt the Battleship into an anti-Corvette-and-Destroyer powerhouse, along with weapons specifically designed for that purpose. These new designs will cause these 'Spitfire Battleships' to have an even higher production cost, but such sacrifices are worth it, if it means protecting our vulnerable capital ships.
v1: 虽然主力舰比之前的任何舰船都强大得多，但它们也昂贵得多，并且是大量较小、更便宜的舰船的首要目标 —— 这些舰船可以以绝对的数量优势来消灭主力舰。为了解决这个问题，我们的工程师正在研究一些新的设计蓝图，将战列舰改造成反护卫舰和驱逐舰的平台，并专门为此目的设计武器。这些新设计将导致这种“集火战列舰”的生产成本更高，但如果这项改进可以有效保护我们脆弱的主力舰，那么高昂的成本就是值得的。
§H解锁舰船升级：§! 集火战列舰

v0:
§HStrike Cruiser§!
Battle experience and extensive wargaming exercises show that fleet combat often ends without a decisive outcome, because the losing side makes an immediate, emergency jump to FTL. Our best scientists have miniaturized the Subspace Snare used on starbases for deployment onto a ship. These vessels will be blisteringly fast, to catch enemy fleets in their Snares, maneuverable enough to keep enemy ships from disengaging from combat, and tough enough to withstand significant punishment to ensure the enemy is pinned down for as long as possible.
v1:
§H攻击巡洋舰§!
基于战场上的战斗经验以及兵棋推演的结果，舰队战斗常常在没有得出胜负的情况下结束，因为劣势的一方会立即通过紧急超光速模式撤退。我们最优秀的科学家已经将星际基地使用的子空间陷阱小型化并部署到了船上。这些舰艇的速度将快得惊人，可以在陷阱中捕获敌方舰队，机动性足以防止敌方舰艇脱离战斗，并且足够坚固以承受大量伤害，确保敌人尽可能长时间地被牵制。
§H解锁舰船升级：§! 攻击巡洋舰

v0:
§HStronghold§!
As fleets grow larger and more powerful, it becomes necessary for our starbases and defensive installations to grow in strength, as well. The Grand Citadel is a powerful and highly advanced system defense station, a massive upgrade to existing Citadel-class starbases. These valuable and highly developed starbases are important installations to our empire, and can support a wide range of facilities.
v1:
§H巨型堡垒§!
随着舰队变得规模更庞大、火力更凶猛，我们的太空基地和防御设施也有必要增强实力。巨型堡垒是一个强大且高度先进的系统防御站，是对现有堡垒级星际基地的大规模升级。这些宝贵且高度发达的星际基地是我们帝国的重要设施，可以支持各种设施。
§H解锁恒星基地升级：§! 巨型堡垒

v0:
§HSupercarrier§!
Further efforts in both ship construction and miniaturization of strike craft support facilities will allow us to squeeze an absolutely incredible number of hangar bays into our Carriers. These Supercarriers will be able to support swarms of strike craft, the better to defend our fleets from attack, and to overwhelm the foe with our best pilots.
v1:
§H超级母舰§!
在船舶建造和攻击机支持设施小型化方面的进一步努力将使我们能够在我们的母舰中容纳数量惊人的机库。这些超级母舰将能够支持成群的攻击机，更好地保护我们的舰队免受攻击，并用我们最好的飞行员压倒敌人。
§H解锁舰船升级：§! 超级母舰

v0:
§HFleet Support Ship§!
As our fleets grow in size, and the distance they travel from home increases, it becomes necessary to support them internally instead of trying to maintain long-range supply lines. The Support Destroyer is the answer to this problem, adding new support capabilities to our Cruisers through the addition of advanced modules.
v1:
§H舰队支援驱逐舰§!
随着我们的舰队规模不断扩大，战斗、巡航范围越来越远，我们有必要在舰队内部为它们提供支持，而不是试图维持远程补给线。舰队支援驱逐舰是这个问题的答案，通过添加高级支援模块为我们的驱逐舰添加新的支援功能。
§H解锁舰船升级：§! 舰队支援驱逐舰

v0: An extremely expensive anti-capital ship missile with a very long range and high damage. Very useful for defense stations or long range artillery ships.
v1: 极其昂贵的反主力舰导弹，射程极远，伤害极高。攻击防御站或远程攻击舰非常有用。

v0: Twice the Dakka, Half the Size.
v1: 超大型恒星基地（待校译）

v0: Our officer drones have been designed with more independent thought in order to adapt in different situations. This means that we can field more ships, with our officer drones able to manage their crews with more autonomy, but overall combat performance will suffer slightly from the lack of unified action.
v1: 我们的军官无人机在设计时具有更加独立的思想，以适应不同的情况。这意味着我们可以部署更多的舰船，让我们的军官无人机能够以更大的自主权管理其人员，但由于缺乏统一行动，整体作战性能将受到轻微影响。

v0: Ships will try to close the distance to the enemy fleet as directly as possible and engage in point blank range.
v1: 舰艇将尝试尽可能直接地拉近与敌方舰队的距离并进行近距离交战。

v0: We will crew our ships mostly with AI units. This has the advantage of producing ship crews at an impressive rate. However, AI units optimized for crew roles have difficulties adapting to rapidly altering situations, which will increase the number of casualties we take in battle.
v1: 我们的舰船将主要由人工智能单元组成。这具有令人印象深刻的船员培养的速度优势。然而，针对乘员角色进行优化的人工智能单位很难适应快速变化的情况，这将增加我们在战斗中的伤亡人数。
§H解锁巨构：§! 战略资源工厂

v0: Our scientists have discovered how to manipulate matter-energy patterns, allowing us to create the resources we need by converting other resources we already have.
v1: 我们的科学家已经发现了如何操纵物质-能量的转换方法，使我们能够通过转换我们已有的其他资源来创造我们需要的资源。

v0: Trust in the strength of our Armor. Thick and impenetrable, it surrounds our hulls in its protective embrace, and cannot be ignored by missiles or torpedoes.
v1: 相信装甲的力量：厚重且坚不可摧的装甲紧密的贴合在船体上，让导弹或鱼雷无法轻易的损伤船体。

v0: We will spread our focus evenly across the weapon types; there is no need to specialize in one to the detriment of the others.
v1: 我们将把重点均匀地分布在不同的武器类型上，没有必要专门研究某一方面而损害其他方面。

v0: Our Navy must be able to project power far away from home--to protect our allies, punish our enemies, and respond to crises wherever they may arise. We cannot rely on Starbases to support our fleet; we must be able to fight anywhere, even across the galaxy. A Black Sky fleet is a tool of diplomacy, just like any other.
v1: 我们的海军必须能够向远离家乡的地方投射力量——保护我们的盟友，惩罚我们的敌人，并对任何可能出现的危机做出反应。我们不能依靠星际基地来支持我们的舰队；我们必须能够在任何地方作战，甚至跨越银河系。

v0: Nothing is more important than the defense of our planets and our people. Our Navy exists purely to defend our nation, and we should plan to keep our campaigns limited to space we control, and fight primarily with our mighty Starbases in support of our fleets.
v1: 没有什么比保卫我们的星球和人民更重要的了。我们海军存在的意义是为了保卫我们的国家，我们应该计划将我们的战役限制在我们控制的星系内，并主要利用我们强大的星际基地来支持我们的舰队。

v0: Kinetic weapons have a long and storied history. Our Kinetic weapons will tear through enemy shields and hulls and bring glory to our nation.
v1: 动能武器有着悠久而传奇的历史。我们的动能武器将撕裂敌人的护盾和船体，为我们的国家带来荣耀。

v0: £trigger_no£ Cannot start another Flagship construction project.
v1: £trigger_no£ 无法启动另一个旗舰建设项目。

v0: Capital Ships are the pride of our fleets. With heavy armaments to obliterate the enemy, and heavy defenses to shrug off any attack, these mighty warships are the greatest weapon in our arsenal. They are nothing less than the future of galactic warfare, and we should build our fleets around them, and focus our efforts on their construction.
v1: 主力舰是我们舰队的骄傲。这些强大的战舰使用重型武器消灭敌人，依靠重型防御抵御任何攻击，它们是我们武器库中最强大的武器。主力舰是星际战争的未来，我们应该围绕它们建立我们的舰队，并集中资源建造它们。

v0: Our Strike Craft are our greatest weapons. Our pilots are the best and brightest of our people, and our Carriers are the vessels that deploy our valiant warriors into battle. We must focus our efforts on producing as many of these powerful vessels as possible.
v1: 我们的舰载机是我们最强大的武器。我们的飞行员是我们人民中最优秀、最聪明的人，我们的母舰是将我们英勇的战士部署到战斗中的关键。我们必须集中资源生产尽可能多的这些强大的母舰。

v0: Opens the Fleet Mothball Control Panel.
v1: 打开舰队封存控制面板。

v0: This option will keep the research alternatives at the normal number - nothing will change.
v1: 此选项将使研究替代方案保持在正常数量 - 不会有任何改变。

v0:
An onslaught is imminent, and our defenses are weak. We absolutely must build up our starbases, and turn them into bristling defensive emplacements, but we have precious little time.

However, by throwing everything we have into the effort, we may be able to fortify our defenses in a fraction of the normal time - it will be incredibly costly, but likely not as costly as losing the war to our hated foes.
v1: 敌人猛烈的进攻即将开始，而我们的防御却十分薄弱。我们必须立即建造我们的星际恒星基地，并将它们变成坚固的防御阵地，但我们的时间很少。 因此我们必须投入所拥有的一切资源，希望能够在短时间内强化一部分我们的防御 —— 这将付出令人难以置信的代价，但可能不会像输给我们可恨的敌人那样代价高昂。

v0: We can control various contents from New Ship Classes 2 mod here.
v1: 我们可以在这里配置“New Ship Classes 2”模组的各种内容。

v0: §YClick to Open the Mod Configuration UI.§!

We must implement a full Naval Academy training program. Crews are to be trained for years, with potential officers given additional specialized training. However, many will fail to meet the high standards we set, reducing the pool of acceptable crews for our ships.
v1: 我们必须实施完整的太空军学院培训计划。船员将接受多年的培训，潜在的军官将接受额外的专门培训。然而，许多人将无法达到我们设定的高标准，从而减少了我们船舶可接受的船员数量。
特殊的探索设备使用的槽位。

v0: Explosive weapons . Our powerful missiles will secure victory for our people.
v1: 伤害巨大的爆炸性武器，我们强大的导弹将为我们的人民确保胜利。

v0: There is a certain majesty to the manipulation of direct energy to destroy one's foes. Our Energy weapons will burn through enemy ships and melt away their fleets.
v1: 直接操纵能量来摧毁敌人是相当令人畏惧的能力，我们的能源武器将烧毁敌方舰船并融化他们的舰队。

v0: If we focus on hardening our shields and armor plating we can resist penetration weapon systems to make our ships tougher
v1: 如果我们专注于强化我们的护盾和装甲，我们就可以抵抗穿透武器系统，从而使我们的舰船变得更坚固。

v0: Light ships are cheap and speedy, both in construction and in space. They're perfect for quashing pirates, protecting trade, defending wide swathes of space, screening larger vessels, and defending our nation on a budget. We need to prioritize the construction of these valuable vessels.
v1: 轻型舰船的建造是相当廉价且快速的，它们非常适合镇压海盗、保护贸易、保卫大片太空、筛查大型舰船以及在有限预算内保卫我们的家园。我们需要优先建造这些有价值的舰船。

v0: We must implement a rapid training program, focused on getting ship crews ready as soon as possible, without any advanced training. This will allow us to swell our ranks with many recruits to fill our ships, but will result in reduced combat performance.
v1: 我们必须实施快速培训计划，重点是让船员尽快做好战斗准备，减少不必要的任何高级培训。这将使我们能够通过更多新兵来充实我们的舰队，从而扩大我们的队伍，但这会导致一定程度上的战斗力下降。

v0: A policy that focuses on a fleet of large and powerful warships. Provides +20% build speed and -20% build cost to Battleships, Carriers, Dreadnoughts, and Titans, but since our shipyards will be focused on these specific ships, smaller classes will build 20% slower and be 20% more expensive.
v1: 一项重点优化大型舰船的政策，为战列舰、母舰、无畏舰和泰坦提供 +20% 的建造速度和 -20% 的建造成本，但由于我们的造船厂将专注于优化这些特定的舰船，较小的舰船建造速度将慢 20%，造价高 20%。

v0: A policy that focuses on a fleet of Carriers equipped with large numbers of strike craft. v0: A policy that focuses on a fleet of fast, light combat ships. Provides +20% build speed and -20% build cost to Corvettes, Destroyers, and Cruisers, but since our shipyards will be focused on these specific ships, larger classes will build 20% slower and be 20% more expensive.
v1: 一项优化快速、轻型舰船的政策。为护卫舰、驱逐舰和巡洋舰提供 +20% 的建造速度和 -20% 的建造成本，但由于我们的造船厂将专注于这些特定的舰艇，因此较大的舰船建造速度将慢 20%，造价高 20%。

Now that we have finalized the permanent design of the Explorer, our fleet logistics team would like to know if you want to upgrade our fleet of Science ships to this new, enhanced design. Performing the upgrade for each ship will take approximately §G250 days§! and will require an investment of §B400 Alloys§! and §Y50 Energy§! per ship, but would give our leading exploration scientists a much better chance of survival in an increasingly hostile universe. We can upgrade up to 8 Science ships to the new class. A Special Project will be created for each ship you want to upgrade, which will require moving that ship to our home system to begin the project. There is no time limit on how quickly you complete the projects. We await your decision.
v1: 我们终于完成了探索者级的终极设计蓝图，我们的舰队后勤部希望知道您是否希望将服役中的科学船升级到最新的探索者级。升级一艘科学船大概需要§B400 合金§! and §Y50 能量币§!以及§G250天§! 时间，升级后的科学船将有更强的生存能力。我们为每艘科学船的升级创建了一个对应的特殊项目，您只需要将需要升级的科学船移动到母星系中并研究对应的特殊项目即可，考虑到后勤压力我们最多可以升级8艘科学船到最新的探索者级，不过您不必中断科学船在执行中的任务，可以在任意时刻指挥科学船开始升级。

v0: Choose not to upgrade any ships at all. (§M+25 Influence§!)
We have completed a Science Ship Upgrade project. The Scientist leader has taken his station and the new ship is now awaiting your orders.
v1: 我们已经完成了科学船升级项目。科学家领袖已经就位，新船正在等待您的命令。

v0: Excellent, we shall boldly go where no one has gone before!
v1: 太好了，我们可以勇敢的去那些无人探索之地了！

v0:
Our intrepid Science Officers have faced incredible danger in their quest to explore the galaxy and uncover all the secrets it has to offer. Our ship engineers have been working together with our scientists to come up with a solution to this problem. We believe we finally have the answer.

The Explorer is a large, combat-capable Science Ship dedicated to exploring new worlds and seeking out new life and new civilizations. Our scientists will no longer have to fear the terrors of the void!
v1:
我们勇敢的科学家们在探索星系、揭开那些隐藏的秘密的过程中面临着难以置信的危险。因此我们的船舶工程师一直在与我们的科学家合作，想找出解决这个问题的方法。现在我们相信我们已经找到了解决方案。
探索者级，是一艘具有战斗能力的大型科学船，致力于探索新世界、寻找新生命和新文明，我们的科学家再也不需要害怕虚空的恐怖！

v0: A ship to change the tide...

Our designs for the massive shipyard needed to build the Flagship are complete. We can begin construction of the assembly facility, but our Naval engineers need to finalize one - and only one - design for the utterly gargantuan vessel to be built. We'll only be able to construct one Flagship, so while we'll be able to retrofit and upgrade the vessel after it has been constructed, we need to have one, single design prior to construction.
v1: 我们建造旗舰所需的大型造船厂已经设计完成。我们可以开始建造装配设施，但我们的海军工程师需要为即将开始建造的巨型军舰完成一项（而且只有一项）设计 —— 我们只能建造一艘旗舰，因此虽然我们能够在建造完成后对其进行改造和升级，但我们在建造之前需要有一个单一的设计。
星际船坞准备开工建设

v0:
Ever since the inception of the Flagship Project, even before the colossal shipyard to construct the vessel was built, many naval theorists have posited that, like previous developments led to a focus on capital ship clashes, the new phase of the naval arms race could one day lead to enemy Flagships meeting on the field of battle. Some even posited that the only feasible way to counter a Flagship would be with another Flagship, making such clashes inevitable.

That day is finally here. Our Flagship is about to engage an enemy Flagship, and the heavens will rumble with their power. Both nations have put enormous resources into developing their Flagships, and designed their doctrines at least partially around the mighty vessels. Now, the entire galaxy will see the results--with the balance of galactic power, and the future of naval combat and thought, on the line.
v1: 自从旗舰项目启动以来，甚至在建造该舰的大型造船厂建成之前，许多海军理论家就认为，就像过去已经发生过无数次的情况一样，这一轮军备竞赛已经开始，主力舰、尤其是旗舰是这一轮军备竞赛的焦点，因此有相当大的概率我们会在战场上与敌人的旗舰相遇。一些人甚至认为对抗旗舰的唯一可行方法就是制造一艘旗舰，从而使此类冲突不可避免。 而这一天终于来了，我们的旗舰即将与敌人的旗舰交战，天空将因他们的力量而隆隆作响。两国都投入了大量资源来发展各自的旗舰，现在，整个星系都将看到结果 —— 星系的力量平衡、无往不利的战术策略都将彻底灰飞烟灭，新的未来即将诞生。

v0:
The construction of our mighty Flagship is naturally afforded the highest classification level we have, and we have spent considerable time, effort, and resources to keep the project shrouded in secrecy.

However, despite our heroic efforts to keep its construction a closely-guarded secret, such a massive project is all but impossible to hide, and the galaxy's foreign powers have been aware of it for some time, and they are not standing idly by while we single-handedly change the face of interstellar warfare. Our intelligence agents are reporting that many empires have already begun construction of their own Flagships, hoping to maintain the balance of power in the galaxy.

A new arms race is now underway.
v1: 旗舰建造计划是我们的最高机密级别，我们花费了大量的时间、精力和资源来保密该项目，然而如此庞大的工程几乎是不可能完全销声匿迹的，星系中的其它势力获得一些关于旗舰的风声有一段时间了，他们不会轻易的袖手旁观。我们的情报人员报告说，许多帝国已经开始建造自己的旗舰或者计划建造自己的旗舰，希望维持星系的军事力量平衡。一场新的军备竞赛正在进行中。

v0:
After years of work, the consumption of vast quantities of resources, the construction of an incredible shipyard, and the expenditure of a considerable amount of political capital, the Flagship is finally complete and fully operational. It is the ultimate warship, capable of annihilating enemy fleets and turning the tides of entire wars.

The unveiling of this massive new warship has been a shock to the citizenry of our own empire, and also to the masses of foreign xenos, but, as previous intelligence reports have indicated, their governments have not been caught by surprise, and have been making their preparations to counter our mighty new weapon. Intelligence reports indicate that several empires are well on their way to rushing their own Flagships into production.
v1: 经过多年的努力、消耗了大量的资源，我们建造了一座令人难以置信的造船厂甚至大量的政治背书以便于工程顺利进行 —— 旗舰终于完工并全面投入使用。它是终极战舰，能够歼灭敌方舰队并扭转整个战争的局势。 这艘新型超大型战舰的亮相震惊了我们帝国的公民，也震惊了整个星系，但是，正如之前的情报报告所表明的那样，他们的政府并没有感到意外，并且一直在准备对抗我们的新武器。情报报告显示，几个帝国正在全力加快自己的旗舰的制造。

v0: The Ultimate Power In The Universe

Our agents now report that multiple foreign powers have launched their own, fully-operational Flagships in an attempt to keep up in the naval arms race. The galaxy is now home to several of these gargantuan warships, with each one carrying enough firepower to crush an entire fleet. While the sheer expense of building and maintaining these vessels will keep any nation from building more than one Flagship, their incredible might will surely shape any future armed conflict in which they take part.
v1: 我们的特工报告说，多个外国势力已经推出了自己的旗舰，试图跟上军备竞赛的步伐。星系现在变成了巨型战舰的后花园，每艘巨型战舰都携带着足以摧毁整个舰队的火力。虽然建造和维护这些船只的巨额费用将阻止任何国家建造超过一艘旗舰，但它们那令人难以置信的力量肯定会影响它们参与的任何未来的军事冲突。

v0: Understood, we will begin the project soon.
v1: 明白了，我们很快就会开始这个项目。

v0:
Our Flagship, the pride of our Navy, the glorious symbol of our empire's might, has been destroyed!

The shock of such a gross calamity can not be understated. The public has put a great deal of faith in the capability of our Flagship to defend us, and our propaganda has heavily featured our Flagship to keep our citizenry inspired. In the days, weeks, and years to come, many will surely question the command decisions that lead to the destruction of the most powerful warship our empire has ever produced.

Now that we no longer have to spend the significant resources needed to maintain the Flagship, it will be possible to construct a new one, though it will require the same kind of in-depth Special Project as before - and we must take care not to lose our next Flagship as well. A review of our Naval strategies is certainly in order.
v1: 我们的旗舰、我们海军的骄傲、我们帝国力量的光荣象征，已经被摧毁了！ 如此严重的灾难所带来的震撼是不可低估的。公众对旗舰保卫国家的能力充满信心，我们的传播机器也大力宣传我们的旗舰，以激励我们的公民。在未来的几天、几周和几年里，许多人肯定会质疑导致我们帝国有史以来最强大的战舰被摧毁的指挥决策。现在我们不再需要花费大量资源来维护旗舰，有足够的资源建造一艘新的旗舰，尽管这对我们来说仍然是一件困难重重的事情 —— 而且我们必须注意：不要再失去我们的下一个旗舰了，对海军战略适当的审查是必要的。

v0: We will rebuild the Flagship when it is needed.
v1: 我们将在需要时重建旗舰。

v0:
The existence of mighty superweapons such as the Flagship have powerful ripple effects. The maintenance costs of such incredible warships are significant, and their mere existence serves as a symbol of a nation's martial disposition - and can raise international tensions and accelerate the naval arms race.

Whether due to economics or politics, you, our honored [Root.GetRulerTitle], has decided to dismantle their Flagship, though the Shipyard remains operational. It is possible to invest the significant resources to immediately begin construction of a new Flagship, though it will be difficult to keep such a massive project a secret - easier this time, at least, since the massive shipyards themselves are already in existence - and the rationale for dismantling and then reconstructing such a massive project is dubious at best. In any event, doing so will require a Special Project.

On the other hand, if it is more prudent to wait and keep our options open for a later date, there is now a Flagship Reconstruction Edict available, for the time when it becomes necessary or desirable to build another Flagship.
v1: 像旗舰这样强大的超级武器的存在会产生巨大的连锁反应。这种无比巨大的军舰的维护成本是巨大的，它们的存在本身就是一个国家军事能力的体现，并可能加剧星际间紧张的局势并加速军备竞赛。 无论是出于经济还是政治原因，您，我们尊敬的[Root.GetRulerTitle]，已决定拆除旗舰。考虑到造船厂仍在运作，投入大量资源立即开始建造一艘新旗舰是可能的，尽管很难将如此庞大的项目保密。无论如何，这样做需要一个特殊项目。更谨慎的做法是等待合适的时机使用旗舰重建法令，以便在有必要或需要建造另一艘旗舰时使用。

v0:
Our new Flagship is finally complete and ready for launch. Hopefully, this one will not meet the same grim fate as the last one - these ships are not cheap or quick to replace, after all, and losing them is a massive blow to our morale and our military power. The Flagship is the most powerful weapon in our arsenal - it should be handled with care.

We must try not to let our people down.
v1: 我们的新旗舰终于完工并准备服役，希望这艘船不会遭遇与上一艘同样严峻的命运 —— 毕竟这样的巨型军舰并不便宜，也不能很快更换，失去它们对我们的士气和军事力量来说是一个巨大的打击。旗舰是我们武器库中最强大的武器，应该小心使用，我们必须尽力不让我们的人民失望。

v0:
Welcome to the Fleet Mothball System. In this window, you can select fleets to Mothball or Reactivate. Please take note of the following:

A planet must be colonized by your empire to Mothball fleets in its orbit. Up to 5 fleets can be Mothballed in a planet's orbit at any given time.

Leased fleets cannot be Mothballed.

Mothballing a fleet will reduce its Naval Capacity usage by 75% and reduce its upkeep costs by 90% as long as it is in Mothball status.

You will not be able to control or move Mothballed fleets. If you accidentally click on and try to move a Mothballed fleet, simply click on it again and right click on the planet to mark it as In Orbit. You will not be able to Reactivate a fleet that is not marked as In Orbit.

Reactivating a fleet will cost alloys to repair the ships to Combat Ready status. The cost will depend on the total hull points of all ships in the fleet. Reactivating a fleet takes 360 days for repairs.

§RWARNING: Make sure that you can afford the increased Upkeep Costs and Naval Capacity of a fleet before Reactivating it!§!
v1:
欢迎使用舰队封存系统。在本系统中，您可以选择封存舰队或者重新激活已封存的舰队。在您发出指令之前，请认真阅读以下说明：
您只能在已被殖民的星球上封存舰队，每个星球最多同时在轨道上封存五支舰队，但要注意租用的舰队无法被封存，封存中的舰队将减少75%占用的海军容量以及90%的维护费用。您无法指挥、移动封存中的舰队，并且您也无法激活没有停留在轨道上的已被封存的舰队。如果您不小心点击并尝试移动舰队（此时舰队在游戏中可能会离开轨道），请再次点击该舰队，然后右键选择其所封存的星球选择停留在星球的轨道上，以便于您可以重新激活它们。激活封存中的舰队达到战备状态需要消耗合金，消耗的合金数量取决于舰队中所有舰船的船体值之和，并且需要花费360天的时间才能完成激活过程。§R警告：在激活已封存的舰队之前，请确保您有足够的海军容量、可以负担起舰队的维护费用§!

v0:
§YSpecial Note: To reopen this menu during the game, open the Governments screen, go to Policies & Edicts, enable the NSC3 Mod Menu edict.§!

§RThe NSC3 Mod Menu allows you to configure the mod to your liking, however it is EXTREMELY important that you only make these changes AT THE START OF YOUR GAME!

If you turn on or off features in the middle of a game, there is a very good chance that it will completely break your save.

The only thing that is relatively safe to do in the middle of a game is increasing the AI bonuses, which should help them grow faster, but once their economy is dependent on those bonuses, lowering them can cause the AI to stop developing or even completely collapse.

Once again, DO NOT CHANGE MOD SETTINGS IN THE MIDDLE OF A GAME. It will likely break your save. You have been warned!§!
v1:
§Y特别注意：要在游戏过程中重新打开此菜单，请打开政府面板，转到政策和法令，启用 NSC3 Mod 法令。§! 
§RNSC3 Mod 菜单允许您根据自己的喜好配置模组，但需要注意的是您只能在游戏开始时更改这些选项！如果您在游戏过程中打开或关闭功能，游戏的保存会被破坏。在游戏过程中唯一相对安全的功能是增加人工智能奖励，这应该有助于他们更快地发展，但是一旦他们的经济依赖于这些奖励，降低它们可能会导致人工智能停止发展甚至完全停止工作。因此再次强调，请勿在游戏中更改模组设置，它可能会破坏你的保存，请认真阅读本信息！§!

v0: This Fleet Doctrine determines what armaments our ship designs should emphasize, at the expense of reduced efficiency with other weapons.
v1: 军备理论决定了我们的舰船设计应强化哪些武器，但以降低其他武器的效率为代价。

v0: This Fleet Doctrine determines which types of ships should make up the bulk of our naval forces, allowing us to construct our favored vessels more quickly at a lower cost, at the expense of taking longer and costing more to build ships that we are not emphasizing.
v1: 舰队主力政策决定了哪些类型的舰船应该构成我们海军的主体，使我们能够以更低的成本更快地建造我们的主力舰队，但代价是建造非主力舰队时需要更长时间和更多的成本。

v0: The training of a Navy's crews and officers is one of the most important aspect it ever undertakes. We should carefully tailor our training programs to fit our circumstances; outdated or maladapted training programs are worse than useless, and will cripple our Navy. We must decide how to train our crews and officers.
v1: 舰队船员和军官的培训是海军最重要的工作之一。我们应该根据我们的具体情况仔细调整我们的培训计划；过时或不适用的训练计划会带来严重的负面效果、削弱我们的军队。我们必须决定如何培训我们的船员和军官。

v0: The training of a Navy's drones is one of the most important aspect it ever undertakes. We should carefully tailor our training programs to fit our circumstances; outdated or maladapted training programs are worse than useless, and will cripple our Navy. We must decide how to train our drones.
v1: 无人机的训练是所有船员培训中非常重要的一部分。我们应该根据我们的具体情况仔细调整我们的培训计划；过时或不适用的训练计划会带来严重的负面效果、削弱我们的军队。我们必须决定如何培训我们的船员和军官。

v0: This Fleet Doctrine determines which type of ship defenses our ships should emphasize, at the cost of reduced efficiency with the other defensive option.
v1: 防御理论决定了我们的舰船应该重视哪种类型的防御，但代价是降低其他防御类型的效果。

v0: A Navy has many duties: Power projection, defense of core territory, and the protection of internal trade. Our Fleet Operations Doctrine determines which of these tasks to emphasize.
v1: 海军有很多职责：力量投送、核心领土的防御以及内部贸易的保护。我们的舰队作战理论决定了哪些我们的军事力量影响优化什么类型的任务。

v0: This policy will allow our empire to spend research points on providing our scientists with more options when choosing their next research project.
v1: 这项政策将允许我们的帝国花费研究点，为我们的科学家在选择下一个研究项目时提供更多的选择。

v0: Our fleets are more than sufficient to defend us and our way of life, but they are also instrumental in protecting our internal trade. Trade is the lifeblood of our Empire, and we must do everything we can to protect it.
v1: 我们的舰队足以保卫我们的家园和我们的生活方式，但它们也有助于保护我们的内部贸易。贸易是我们帝国的命脉，我们必须尽一切努力保护它。

v0: Our drones must be of the highest quality, to make our ships fight at peak efficiency. We will be unable to fill as many ships as we might have with more lax standards, but this is the price we pay for excellence.
v1: 我们的无人机必须具有最高质量，才能使我们的舰队以最高效率作战，但是在这种情况下我们可能无法尽可能得利用舰船的无人机空间，这就是我们为追求卓越而付出的代价。

v0: Our drones require only minimal training. Our ships must be fast, and blot out the stars with their numbers; it does not take much training to do this. Each ship is a negligible loss; there are two more to take its place. The Swarm will overwhelm with sheer numbers.
v1: 我们的无人机只需要最基础必要的训练。它们必须速度快且数量足以遮蔽星辰，无穷无尽的机群让损失可以忽略不计 —— 虫群将以绝对数量压倒一切。

v0: As larger and larger vessels become more common, combat is taking place at longer ranges, and offensive firepower is becoming an ever-more-decisive factor in battle. Our naval theorists suggest building a long, powerful vessel capable of mounting large, medium, and most notably, guided weapon emplacements, to specialize in hurling as much weaponry at the enemy as possible, in either mid- or long-range combat.
v1: 随着舰船的规模不断的变大，射程原来越远的武器大大的提升了战场范围，进攻性火力正在成为战斗的决定性因素。我们的海军理论家建议建造一艘更强大的舰船，能够安装大型、中型以及最引人注目的制导武器炮台，以便在中远程战斗中向敌人输出强大的火力。

v0: Strike Craft have proven to be highly successful weapons in naval combat. It is time to design a specialized warship for the express purpose of carrying these weapons into battle, and housing the large support staff and maintenance bays that they require. Doing so will allow these new Carrier vessels to carry far more strike craft than their more improvised predecessors.
v1: 战斗机是一种非常成功的太空格斗武器。现在是时候设计一艘专门的携带这些战斗机的军舰了，该型母舰将搭载战斗机所需的大量支持人员和维护舱，这将使其能够比其它型舰船携带更多的战斗机。

v0: The Battleship heralded a new era of ship design and naval combat. The ability to both deliver and take massive damage at long range, and the advent of devastating XL weaponry, have completely changed the nature of warfare. Our naval engineers believe that we should develop an even better version of these powerful ships. Their proposed 'Dreadnoughts' would be capable of mounting heavier defenses, more guns, and even two of the incredible XL weapons that have been so successful on the battlefield.
v1: 战列舰的出现预示着舰船设计和太空战斗的新时代。这些在远距离上造成巨大伤害的能力，以及毁灭性的 XL 武器的出现，彻底改变了战争的性质。我们的太空工程师认为，我们应该开发这些强大舰船的升级版本。他们提出的“无畏舰”将能够安装更重的防御、更多的火炮，甚至还有两种在战场上非常成功的令人难以置信的XL武器。

v0:
The naval arms race has seen the production of larger and larger warships with no end in sight. Our naval engineers have suggested jumping to the logical conclusion of this serial escalation by constructing a ship so massive and powerful, that no empire will be able to support more than one of them at a time. This proposed Flagship will be the ultimate warship. Designed for maximum versatility, each section will have many possible configurations, allowing us to design our Flagship to suit our purposes. Mounting far more thrusters per ton than any other ship, the Flagship will be able to take any position in the fleet, from a long-range battery in the rear, to a massive brawler at the tip of a fleet's spear.

This power and versatility will come at a heavy cost, however. Merely building the Flagship will be an enormous endeavor, requiring a colossal stockpile of resources and a significant investment of time and manpower. Upon completion, it will take the entire GDP of a small star nation to maintain; as a result, it will require a massive amount of political influence to obtain approval for the project.
v1:
随着军备竞赛愈演愈烈，军舰的规模不断突破，越来越庞大的军舰被制造了出来。我们的海军工程师建议，通过建造一艘超级规模的军舰来终结这场没有止境的竞赛，这艘军舰如此的庞大以至于没有任何一个帝国能够同时拥有超过一艘。这艘设计中的旗舰将是终极战舰。这艘旗舰在设计时就充分的考虑到了同时支持多种不同的任务的需要，其每个部分都有许多种不同的配置，这使得我们能够自由的设计我们的旗舰以满足各种要求 —— 旗舰将能够占据舰队中的任何位置，从作为后方的远程炮台远程开火，到带领整个舰队冲锋陷阵。
但是，与此同时实现如此强大的能力是有很高代价的 —— 仅仅建造旗舰就将是一项艰巨的任务，需要大量的资源储备以及大量的时间和人力投入。并且一旦建成，旗舰通常需要一个小星国的全部GDP才能维持；因此，该项目需要巨大的政治影响力才能获得批准。

v0: Battle experience and extensive wargaming exercises show that fleet combat often ends without a decisive outcome, because the losing side makes an immediate, emergency jump to FTL. Our best scientists have miniaturized the Subspace Snare used on starbases for deployment onto a ship. These vessels will be blisteringly fast, to catch enemy fleets in their Snares, maneuverable enough to keep enemy ships from disengaging from combat, and tough enough to withstand significant punishment to ensure the enemy is pinned down for as long as possible.
v1: 基于战场上的战斗经验以及兵棋推演的结果，舰队战斗常常在没有得出胜负的情况下结束，因为劣势的一方会立即通过紧急超光速模式撤退。我们最优秀的科学家已经将星际基地使用的子空间陷阱小型化并部署到了船上。这些舰艇的速度将快得惊人，可以在陷阱中捕获敌方舰队，机动性足以防止敌方舰艇脱离战斗，并且足够坚固以承受大量伤害，确保敌人尽可能长时间地被牵制。

v0: As our ship building capabilities continue to increase, we continue to look for new ways to advance our current ship class layouts. v0: An utterly gargantuan, state-of-the-art space-borne hospital, dedicated to the study of the various xenoraces in the galaxy, and the analysis and treatment of all the diseases and conditions that afflict them.

v0: The starbase sensor station uses advanced sensor arrays to extend our intelligence gathering capabilities across several star systems, giving us advanced warning of any possible threats near our borders.

v0: Advancements in technology and logistics allow us to operate much more efficient supply lines to our fleets, thereby significantly reducing our ship upkeep costs.

v0: Reactor powered by a quantum singularity.

v0: As fleets grow larger and more powerful, it becomes necessary for our defensive installations to grow in strength, as well. These expanded Defense Stations, an upgrade to the basic Defense Platforms we currently use, will allow us to better defend our territory from enemy attack.
v1: 随着舰队规模变得越来越强大，我们的防御设施也有必要增强实力。这些增强的防御设施是对目前在役的防御站的升级，将使我们能够更好地保卫我们的领土免受敌人的攻击。

v0: As fleets grow larger and more powerful, it becomes necessary for our defensive installations to grow in strength, as well. These expanded Fortress-level defensive installations, an upgrade to the Defense Stations currently in use, will allow us to better defend our territory from enemy attack.

v0: Our scientists have come up with a wide range of powerful new modules allowing for the enhancement and further specialization of our warships. Now we only have to miniaturize them, to make them small enough to carry aboard our vessels.

v0: While capital ships are far more powerful than any vessels that have come before them, they are also far more expensive, and pose juicy targets for swarms of smaller, cheaper vessels that can overwhelm the capital ships with sheer numbers. To counter this, our engineers are working on a few blueprints that could adapt the Battleship into an anti-Corvette-and-Destroyer powerhouse, along with weapons specifically designed for that purpose. These new designs will cause these 'Spitfire Battleships' to have an even higher production cost, but such sacrifices are worth it, if it means protecting our vulnerable capital ships.
v1: 虽然主力舰比之前的任何舰船都强大得多，但它们也昂贵得多，并且是大量较小、更便宜的舰船的首要目标 —— 这些舰船可以以绝对的数量优势来消灭主力舰。为了解决这个问题，我们的工程师正在研究一些新的设计蓝图，将战列舰改造成反护卫舰和驱逐舰的平台，并专门为此目的设计武器。这些新设计将导致这种“集火战列舰”的生产成本更高，但如果这项改进可以有效保护我们脆弱的主力舰，那么高昂的成本就是值得的。

v0: As fleets grow larger and more powerful, it becomes necessary for our starbases and defensive installations to grow in strength, as well. The Grand Citadel is a powerful and highly advanced system defense station, a massive upgrade to existing Citadel-class starbases. These valuable and highly developed starbases are important installations to our empire, and can support a wide range of facilities.
v1: 随着舰队变得规模更庞大、火力更凶猛，我们的太空基地和防御设施也有必要增强实力。巨型堡垒是一个强大且高度先进的系统防御站，是对现有堡垒级星际基地的大规模升级。这些宝贵且高度发达的星际基地是我们帝国的重要设施，可以支持各种设施。

v0: The final upgrade in the starbase chain, the Solar Stronghold is the ultimate command and defense station, the largest class of starbase that it is possible to build. Enemy fleets will break upon these massive bulwarks, and each one is a vital asset to our empire, defending the most critical locations on the galactic map.
v1: 恒星要塞是恒星基地的最终形态，是终极指挥和防御中心，是可以建造的最大级别的恒星基地。敌方舰队将难以突破这些巨大的堡垒，每一座恒星要塞都是帝国的重要资产，保卫着银河地图上最关键的位置。

v0: Advancements in technology and training allow us to teach our starbase support staff much  more efficient maintenance methods, thereby significantly reducing our starbase upkeep costs.
v1: 技术和培训的进步使我们能够向我们的恒星基地支持人员传授更有效的维护方法，从而显着降低我们的恒星基地维护成本。

v0: Further efforts in both ship construction and miniaturization of strike craft support facilities will allow us to squeeze an absolutely incredible number of hangar bays into our Carriers. These Supercarriers will be able to support swarms of strike craft, the better to defend our fleets from attack, and to overwhelm the foe with our best pilots.
v1: 在船舶建造和攻击机支持设施小型化方面的进一步努力将使我们能够在我们的母舰中容纳数量惊人的机库。这些超级母舰将能够支持成群的攻击机，更好地保护我们的舰队免受攻击，并用我们最好的飞行员压倒敌人。

v0: As our fleets grow in size, and the distance they travel from home increases, it becomes necessary to support them internally instead of trying to maintain long-range supply lines. The Support Destroyer is the answer to this problem, adding new support capabilities to our Destroyers through the addition of advanced modules.
v1: 随着我们的舰队规模不断扩大，战斗、巡航范围越来越远，我们有必要在舰队内部为它们提供支持，而不是试图维持远程补给线。舰队支援驱逐舰是这个问题的答案，通过添加高级支援模块为我们的驱逐舰添加新的支援功能。

v0: With the development of combat at longer and longer ranges, as well as the appearance of massive capital ships and defensive installations, there is a clear need for larger, more powerful missiles capable of taking on these new threats, and being launched from our own ships. These Advanced Cruise Missiles are the answer to this emerging need.
v1: 随着越来越远的作战距离，以及大型主力舰和防御设施的出现，我们的舰队显然需要能够应对这些新威胁的更强大的导弹，这些先进巡航导弹是这一新的威胁的解决方案。

v0: As we continue our trek into the stars, we must find focus in the composition of our fleets.
v1: 随着我们深入对星际空间的探索，我们必须选择军事力量的发展方向。

v0: We will focus on armor and shields in equal measure; there is no need to favor one over the other. They are strongest together.
v1: 我们将同等重视装甲和护盾；没有必要偏袒其中之一。他们在一起是最强的。

v0: Cruisers, and their larger cousins, Strike Cruisers and Battlecruisers, are the most versatile ships we can build. They excel at all ranges, with a wide range of weapons, and are tough enough to withstand a hit, but don't take nearly as long to build, or cost nearly as much to produce and maintain, as capital ships. For a versatile fleet, we should focus on Cruisers to fill out our Navy.
v1: 巡洋舰及其更强大的改进型攻击巡洋舰和战列巡洋舰是我们可以建造的最通用的军舰。它们在所有射程上都表现出色，拥有多种武器，并且足够坚韧，可以承受打击，同时建造时间不像主力舰那么长，生产和维护成本也不像主力舰那样高。对于一支多功能舰队，我们应该专注于巡洋舰来充实我们的舰队。
